definitions.text: a typeface (based on an 18th century design by Gianbattista Bodoni) distinguished by regular shape and hairline serifs and heavy downstrokes
belonging to the modern era; since the Middle Ages
examples: totem poles are modern rather than prehistoric

definitions.text: relating to a recently developed fashion or style
examples: their offices are in a modern skyscraper

definitions.text: characteristic of present-day art and music and literature and architecture

examples: had advanced views on the subject

definitions.text: used of a living language; being the current stage in its development
